nuclei.sqli: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
nuclei.rfi: CWE-94: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
nuclei.rce: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
